dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8713 IH: Stopping Taliban Operatives from Penetrating Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Tiffany introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To provide the notices of determination of the Secretary of Homeland Security and the Secretary of State entitled Exercise of Authority Under Section 212(d)(3)(B)(i) of the Immigration and Nationality Act shall have no force or effect.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stopping Taliban Operatives from Penetrating Act or the STOP Act.

section.header: Exercise of Authority Under Section 212(d)(3)(B)(i) of the Immigration and Nationality Act
section.text: The following notices of determination shall have no force or effect:

paragraph.text: The notice of determination of the Secretary of Homeland Security and the Secretary of State entitled Exercise of Authority Under Section 212(d)(3)(B)(i) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (87 Fed. Reg. 37523).

The notice of determination of the Secretary of Homeland Security and the Secretary of State entitled Exercise of Authority Under Section 212(d)(3)(B)(i) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (87 Fed. Reg. 37524).
